attributes.action: Introduce a graduated driver licensing system
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Introduce a system similar to New Zealand where new drivers must allow a certain amount of time between each stage of there licence to ensure drivers have suitable time to gain experience but are still restricted under the same conditions. Example below.

Stage 1 - Learners Licence minimum 3 months driving experience from pass date - theory test and basic driving skills test.

Stage 2 - Restricted Licence minimum 9 months passed since passing stage 1 - You can drive on your own, but not between 10 pm and 5 am or carry passengers unless with supervised driver. end of 9 months take Full Practical test

Stage 3 - Full Licence.
